PerfectNetExp.abs: 经验主义（empiricism）（Empiricism）一种认识论学说，认为人类知识起源于感觉，并以感觉的领会为基础。经验主义（empiricism）诞生于古希腊。
经验论（empiricism）（对于以「科学定律」(scientific law)描述文化的各项尝试，抱持著怀疑态度）将文化视为流动与动态的观念民 …
实证主义 (empiricism) 兴起之后，科学主义 (scientism) 的浪潮席卷整个世界，带来现代主义 (modernism) 的灿烂成就。许多基督徒也 …

entry.def: Empiricism is the belief that people should rely on practical experience and experiments, rather than on theories as, a basis for knowledge.

means.word_mean: 1. (philosophy) the doctrine that knowledge derives from experience
2. the application of empirical methods in any art or science
3. medical practice and advice based on observation and experience in ignorance of scientific findings
